title: Multi-Interaction-Based Online University English Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Simulation/VR-based training for current professionals in smartphone-limited technical environments, emphasizing formative assessment-driven feedback systems.

learning_goals: Personalized learning pathways generated through learner profile analysis are executed with over 80% engagement rates
Increase the frequency of teacher-student and student-student interactions by 500% compared to baseline (at least 5 times per week)
Achieve over 75% accuracy in practical English communication scenarios using VR simulations
Record scores of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in participation and satisfaction during collaborative tasks within the learning community

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
